name: Koihime Enbu RyoRaiRai: Jokou and Kakuka
storyline:
Jokō Kōmei (Real Name: Shanfū) - CV. Chiyo Ousaki
She's an introvert who does not talk much and works quietly without showing much emotion. She's small in stature but wields a large axe with ease that is out of proportion to her size. She is one of the bravest in the Gi military forces.

Kakuka Hōkō (Real Name: Rin) - CV: Asami Nakamura
She is serious and sometimes gives her opinions to Cao Cao, but her stubborn attitude is the reverse of her true feelings. Whenever she gets distracted, she has a habit of bursting into a nosebleed because of her delusion of being bullied by Sōsō. She uses the "Supersonic Impact," which blasts away approaching enemies.
summary: Koihime Enbu RyoRaiRai: Jokō and Kakuka is a DLC for Koihime Enbu RyoRaiRai. You will be able to use the new playable character Jokō and a new support character Kakuka.
